# DESCRIPTION
## Level: 2 Score 10 Category crypto
### Haha, tu n'y arriveras jamais... this old french men thinks he can troll us. He sends messages and messages again. Show him that you are awesome by breaking the message. Hint: Flag content should be lowercase.
### Link: https://github.com/SecurityValley/PublicCTFChallenges/tree/master/crypto/french

<br><br>
The contents of the message.txt are:
```

```
<br><br>
Using [cipher-identifier](https://www.dcode.fr/cipher-identifier) told us that it is [Vigenere Cipher](https://www.dcode.fr/vigenere-cipher).

Since the name of the challenge is french, I thought that the keyword will be french, but I could not get any answer. Then I figured that french is a language, so I change the parameter of the plaintext language to french and voila:
```

```
<br>

Upon formatting the text for better readability, we get this:
```
...YOU COULD USE ANAKINSKYWALKER AS FLAG KEEP IN MIND THAT YOU NEED TO FORMAT THE FLAG BEFORE SUBMITTING...
```
Flag: SecVal{anakinskywalker}
